text: Dems should be running ads now nailing the Repubs for trying to destroy American democracy. It's going on right now of course, and the Repubs actually agree, and probably don't have a defense. And the evidence is going to keep coming through the winter and into spring. So there will no shortage of new material for the ads. Why not attack now?? Just run ads on social media. I'll give you $100. Dems. Come on. It's showtime!
